Requirement: User registration with email/phone verification
Acceptance Criteria: Account created only after OTP verification

Requirement: KYC-light capture (PAN/mobile for Indian users)
Acceptance Criteria: System stores identifier for audit trail - not for trading

Requirement: Role-based access: Guest - Free User - Subscriber - Admin
Acceptance Criteria: Each role sees only permitted features

Requirement: Session management with forced logout on plan expiry
Acceptance Criteria: Downgrade to Free User view within 5 minutes of expiry

Requirement: Support minimum 3 plan tiers (Free - Basic - Premium)
Acceptance Criteria: Plans differ by alert frequency - stock coverage - historical depth

Requirement: Integrate one payment gateway (Razorpay/Stripe)
Acceptance Criteria: Payment confirmation triggers plan activation within 60 seconds

Requirement: Auto-renewal with 3-day advance reminder
Acceptance Criteria: User can cancel before renewal without charge

Requirement: Grace period of 48 hours post-expiry before downgrade
Acceptance Criteria: User retains access during grace window

Requirement: Connect to minimum 3 data sources at launch (e.g. NSE API - MoneyControl - screener.in)
Acceptance Criteria: Data refresh at configured intervals per source

Requirement: Normalize incoming data into unified stock schema
Acceptance Criteria: All sources map to single internal stock model

Requirement: Flag stale data if source fails refresh beyond threshold
Acceptance Criteria: Admin notified; stale data excluded from AI scoring

Requirement: Store raw ingestion logs for 90 days
Acceptance Criteria: Enables audit and replay if reprocessing needed

Requirement: Capture recommendations with source - date - target price - horizon
Acceptance Criteria: No recommendation stored without these fields

Requirement: De-duplicate same stock recommendation from multiple sources within 24-hour window
Acceptance Criteria: Single consolidated entry with source count

Requirement: Tag each recommendation with sector - market cap category
Acceptance Criteria: Enables filtering in user-facing views

Requirement: Score each recommendation on fundamental metrics (PE - debt/equity - promoter holding - earnings trend)
Acceptance Criteria: Score generated within 30 seconds of ingestion

Requirement: Score on technical signals (RSI - moving average crossover - volume spike)
Acceptance Criteria: Configurable weightage per signal

Requirement: Composite confidence score (0-100) combining both
Acceptance Criteria: Threshold configurable by Admin (default: 60 to pass)

Requirement: Auto-reject recommendations below threshold with logged reason
Acceptance Criteria: Rejected items visible in Admin audit view

Requirement: Support manual override by Admin with audit trail
Acceptance Criteria: Override reason mandatory

Requirement: Push notification to mobile app for verified alerts
Acceptance Criteria: Delivery within 2 minutes of AI approval

Requirement: Email digest option (instant - daily - weekly) per user preference
Acceptance Criteria: User configures in settings

Requirement: In-app alert center with read/unread status
Acceptance Criteria: Alerts persist for 90 days

Requirement: Rate-limit alerts to avoid fatigue (max 5/day for Basic - 15/day for Premium)
Acceptance Criteria: Excess alerts queued for next window

Requirement: Track stock price at alert time and at defined horizons (7d - 30d - 90d)
Acceptance Criteria: Price snapshot automated via scheduled job

Requirement: Calculate return % and tag as Hit/Miss against target
Acceptance Criteria: Hit = achieved target within horizon

Requirement: Display success rate per source - sector - time period
Acceptance Criteria: User and Admin dashboards

Requirement: Allow user to mark 'I acted on this' for personal tracking
Acceptance Criteria: Optional; no liability implication

Requirement: Free users can view recommendations older than 7 days
Acceptance Criteria: Real-time and recent alerts gated

Requirement: Performance stats visible but without actionable alerts
Acceptance Criteria: Builds trust - drives conversion

Requirement: Add/edit/disable data sources without code deployment
Acceptance Criteria: Config-driven source management

Requirement: Adjust AI scoring weights and thresholds
Acceptance Criteria: Changes logged with timestamp and admin ID

Requirement: View ingestion health dashboard (success/failure rates)
Acceptance Criteria: Alerts if failure rate exceeds 20% in 1 hour

Requirement: User management: view subscribers - manually extend/revoke access
Acceptance Criteria: Action logged

Requirement: Display SEBI disclaimer on every alert: 'Not investment advice'
Acceptance Criteria: Disclaimer non-dismissable in UI

Requirement: Terms acceptance mandatory at registration
Acceptance Criteria: Checkbox with timestamp stored

Requirement: No direct buy/sell execution; information-only platform
Acceptance Criteria: System has no broker integration
